column4: well i downloaded the latest version 2.6.32.8 and jst wanted to upgrade from what i have
it would be nice to learn
make config; make; make modules - then copy the bzImage file to /boot and.... GOOD LUCK :-)
i dont want to be mean, try "make menuconfig" instead of just config :)
is the menuconfig pretty much setup to defaults or will i have to do some auditing?

its somehow default. if you find your old kernels config (check /proc/config.gz or /boot ) you can inherit from that with "make oldconfig" - if your first kernel boots without panic, you earnd my respect ;-)
